name: Hide Reactions
description: This allows you to hide the reactions (Agrees, Awesomes, etc) on all posts.
additional_info:
2/23/16:
- Adding back the buttons for Awesome/Agree/etc, however I hide the profile pictures and the counts. This way a user can still click the Agree/Awesome but not see the counts.
- Updated screenshot to reflect this change.

2/12/16:
- Fixing issue that hid the Quote and Report buttons.
